message.content:
cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.MA, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with a real-time monitoring system for IoT devices transmitting status updates to a common destination, which involves optimization of the average age of information and energy cost. This problem is formulated as an MDP, which falls under the category of control theory and optimization (cs.SY). The paper also discusses the use of correlated status information at the IoT devices, which relates to information theory (cs.IT). Additionally, the paper deals with IoT systems, which falls under the category of networking and internet architecture (cs.NI). The optimization problem involves stochastic processes, which relates to machine learning (cs.LG) and mathematical optimization (cs.MA).
